name: Gan Noe
description: Gan Noe Preschool is a home based preschool in Noe Valley neighborhood with a huge outdoor space where children can explore and have fun as well as a bright and inviting indoor facility. As a Jewish pre-school they learn about and emphasize the Jewish holidays through our activities and projects.
